responses.rationale: The segment describes a specific case and its characteristics, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a hopeful future possibility ('resolve itself very quickly') and capability ('pullets coming into production') without explicit calming keywords.
The segment describes the nature of the virus, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes a potential negative future possibility (increased risk), not a hopeful one or capability/preparedness.
Describes a hopeful future possibility ('resolve itself very quickly') without explicit calming keywords.
The segment expresses a personal sentiment, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes past/current negative impacts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes past/current negative impacts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes current/future negative impacts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes a risk factor, not capability or preparedness.
Recommends a safeguard ('should take precautions') without explicit calming keywords.
The segment describes a future negative impact, not capability or preparedness.
Contains an explicit calming cue ('risk... remains low').
The segment describes symptoms/impacts, not capability or preparedness.
